channel.title: Jekyll on Petrie's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Petrie's Site

item.title: Jekyll Install Troubleshooting
item.description: 错误内容： ERROR: Error installing jekyll: ERROR: Failed to build gem native extension. 高版本的ruby 导致的问题，修复命令： sudo apt-get install ruby1.9.1-dev gem install jekyll
